(3) of the following:

KAT-POLY accepts TC II, Craft Certificate, NCE, 
NTC with four (4) credits in four (4) relevant 
subjects including Mathematics. OR Category B 
Physics/Technical Drawing and any of  
Mathematics or General Science)  
SHEHU IDRIS requires five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and one 
(1) subject chosen from Physics, Food and 
Nutrition, Economics, Commerce and Home 
Management.  
KAD-POLY requires Chemistry and any two (2) of  
Biology, Agricultural Science, Food & Nutrition, 
Physics, Mathematics and Economics as UTME 
subjects.  
RUGIPO accepts either of Biology or Agricultural 
Science as UTME subjects  
FEDPO-EDE requires five (5) O' level credit 
passes in E nglish Language, Mathematics, 
Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science/Health 
Science and one (1) subject from the following 
Food and Nutrition, Physics, Economics, 
Commerce. Accepts Physics as UTME subject.  
IMO-POLY- requires a credit pass in Chemistry. 
MAPOLY requires five (5) credits at not more than 
two sittings to include Mathematics, Chemistry, 
Biology/ Agricultural Science with at least pass in 
English Language and Physics.  
   h)  FEDPO-BAU accepts Chemistry, 
Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics and 
Economics.  
   i)  FEDPO-EDE requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics,
